data.partBlankContent: Linda grew up in Scarsdale, New York, and attended Sarah Lawrence College. She enj____ music, and sa__ girl gr___ songs wi__ friends. When T__ Beatles bec___ famous i_ America, she atte____ one o_ their conc____. She never considered a musical career.
data.fullContent: Linda grew up in Scarsdale, New York, and attended Sarah Lawrence College. She enjoyed music, and sang girl group songs with friends. When The Beatles became famous in America, she attended one of their concerts. She never considered a musical career.
data.answer: 琳达在纽约的斯卡斯代尔长大，就读于萨拉劳伦斯学院。她喜欢音乐，和朋友们一起演唱女子团体歌曲。当甲壳虫乐队在美国出名时，她参加了他们的一场音乐会。她从未想过要从事音乐事业。
